entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Nanaimo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:57 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nanaimo Airport 10:00 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023
Temperature: 5.1°C
Pressure: 102.3 kPa
Humidity: 88 %
Dewpoint: 3.2°C
Wind: W 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind light except northwest 30 km/h near the Strait of Georgia late this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 10:15 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:15 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 10:15 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023
